text: AN/M2 is a US military designation from the WW2 era that was used by multiple aircraft guns. AN/M2 may refer to: *.30 in (7.62 mm), AN/M2, a version of the M1919 Browning machine gun meant for aircraft use *.50 in (12.7 mm), AN/M2, a version of the M2 Browning machine gun meant for aircraft use *20 mm AN/M2, a US variant of the Hispano-Suiza HS.404 autocannon meant for aircraft use
title: AN/M2
